TopicTitle: Why is stability enhancer adding 2 meters?

Articles.Content: I have a 35.2 meter rocket with nozzles almost touching the ground. (Adding, at most 1/2 meter to the rocket's height). When I add a launch stability enhancer, it adds 2 meters, making my rocket 37.2 meters high. Why?

Maybe because they automatically move the rocket up slightly so that the very bottom (nozzles) are around 2 meters off the ground. They are counted as parts and are thus part of the vessel initially, adding to the total height.
